name: wwf-donations-plugin
description: JS project setup for wordpress plugin

scripts.build:clean: cd "../../assets" && npm run clean && cd "../wp/wwf-donations-plugin" && npm run build
scripts.build: cd "../../assets" && npm run assemble && cd "../wp/wwf-donations-plugin" && shx mkdir -p images && shx cp -fr "../../assets/dist/banner.css" . && shx cp -fr "../../assets/dist/images/*" "images/"

author: EXXETA AG
